title: Feast card
data:
{{obsolete}}
{{flavour|The card depicts lords and ladies gorging themselves in a lavish banquet hall.}}
The Feast card sets the player's current [[Nutrition|nutrition]] level to 12000, becoming instantly engorged.

==History==
The Feast card could be found in the following [[Decks|decks]] over the past several versions.

==History==
The deck of oddities was removed in [[0.19]] and thus this card is no longer available.
